title: Following up after a job interview
context: Email the hiring manager to thank them and ask when they will make a decision.

content.bestLine: Thank you for the opportunity, when can I expect a decision?

neutral.text: Looking forward to hearing from you
Please let me know the next steps
I'm eager to learn about the decision

formal.text: I would appreciate an update on the status
Thank you for your time and consideration
I look forward to the opportunity to contribute
Please inform me of the expected decision timeline
I am confident in my abilities to excel in the role

patterns.template: Thank you for [option], I look forward to [option]
I would appreciate it if you could [option] by [option]
options: let me know the next steps

dialogs.description: Follow-up email after a job interview

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: Dear Hiring Manager, thank you for the opportunity to interview for the position.

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: I look forward to hearing from you soon and learning about the next steps.

dialogs.description: Phone call follow-up after a job interview

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: Hello, I wanted to express my gratitude for the interview and inquire about the expected decision timeline.

lines.speaker: Hiring Manager
lines.text: We will be making a decision soon and will notify you via email.
